greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of colors needed to paint a wheel graph on n nodes.
comment: Adjacent nodes are not allowed to have the same color.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1001
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Wheel graph
program: (Scheme) (define (A158515 n) (if (< n 4) n (- 4 (modulo n 2)))) ;; _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 14 2017
results.author: _Jaume Oliver Lafont_, Mar 20 2009
